QuestData.Title: The Rumpus
QuestData.Description: Master Stone Fist has trained you in the art of one-on-one combat. Now you learn the art of one-on-many.$b$bHow does fifty sound?$b$bLower yourself into the Ring of Inner Focus below, then, when you're ready, set off this firework. My assistants will come at you, several at a time.$b$bAll you need to do is survive.
QuestData.LogDescription: Set off the Monastery Fireworks in the Ring of Inner Focus, then survive the Rumpus for two minutes.
QuestData.RewardText: Your $c fighting style is strong, $n. Our trainees could learn much from watching you.
